channel.title: Signature verification failure
channel.description:
Greeting's
I've downloaded Whonix images and I have successfully imported the signing key (https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix_Signing_Key). I have also established trust for the said key and verified that by checking in Kleopetra that the key is now listed under Trusted certificates. I am however, unable to verify integrity of the downloaded images with an error - "could not determine whether this is an S/MIME or an OpenPGP signature - maybe it is not a signature at all?" Can anyone tell me where I may be going wrong?

item.title: Signature verification failure
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Kleopatra has been problematic in past.
See:

Whonix

Verify the virtual machine images using Windows

Instructions for OpenPGP Verification of Whonix using Windows


Try using gpg command line.

Read full topic

item.title: Signature verification failure
item.dc:creator: byte
item.description:
Greeting’s

I’ve downloaded Whonix images and I have successfully imported the signing key (https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix_Signing_Key). I have also established trust for the said key and verified that by checking in Kleopetra that the key is now listed under Trusted certificates. I am however, unable to verify integrity of the downloaded images with an error - “could not determine whether this is an S/MIME or an OpenPGP signature - maybe it is not a signature at all?” Can anyone tell me where I may be going wrong?

Read full topic
